segments.text: What a disgusting sight this kitchen has become.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water gushing from the sink, soaking everything in filth.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle spreads, dirtying the floor and cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That woman polishes her plate while standing in the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her shoe's wet, probably tracking grime everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Kids sneaking cookies from the jarâ€”sticky hands all over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's on that rickety stool, making it worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Crumbly cookies dropping into the water below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's hand out, begging for her dirty treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Open cabinets expose dust and who knows what else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sunlight from the window just illuminates the sloppiness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks clean, unlike this pigsty.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe they're ignoring the nasty overflow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Everything's going to mold if they don't clean up.
segments.speaker: PAR
